botInfo.name: About
botInfo.value:
Tinker is a simple all-round helper for any server! From announcements to moderation, memes to dad jokes, music to afk, Tinker provides you with anything and everything necessary to keep your server running smoothly
This little dude has his own personality which never fails to put a smile on everyone's face!

botInfo.name: Updates and Information
botInfo.value: Tinker gets updates all the time: bug fixes, new features and prettifying to give you the best experience, and we'd love to hear how we are doing. Head to out Support Server :arrow_down: and give us some feedback. We listen to each and every request, bug report, cry for help and small annoyance because we want the best for you

botInfo.name: Developers
botInfo.value: Author & Lead Dev: Inanis#2432, Devs: TechnoBiscuit#3540, Dukemz#7766
